body:
## What's Changed
* Add support for method return ByteBuf by @zhou-hao in https://github.com/scalecube/scalecube-services/pull/827
* Updated parent, updated dependencies by @artem-v in https://github.com/scalecube/scalecube-services/pull/828

## New Contributors
* @zhou-hao made their first contribution in https://github.com/scalecube/scalecube-services/pull/827

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/scalecube/scalecube-services/compare/2.10.23...2.10.24

## What's Changed:

- version update: `scalecube-cluster -> 2.6.12`
- added support of  composite auth context (service method can deal simultaneously with transport auth context and service method auth context, check example)

Set the cluster transport and its metadata (ServiceEndpoint) explicitly.
Upgrade to `scalecube-cluster` `2.6.10`.
Upgrade to `reactor` `2020.0.10`.
Upgrade to `rsocket` `1.0.5`.
Upgrade to `netty` `4.1.66.Final`.

## Updates

- Enhanced logic for handling aborted connections.
- Added new exceptions type `ConnectionClosedException`.

* Updated `scalecube-cluster` to `2.6.9`
* Updated `reactor` to `2020.0.6`
* Updated `netty` to `4.1.63.Final`

- added `Hooks.onErrorDropped` at `RSocketServiceTransport` to handle uncaught `reactor.netty.channel.AbortedException` occurrences which being raised from 3rdparties.
- added scalecube-security modules:  `scalecube-services-security` and `scaelcube-services-vault`
- `scalecube-services-security` / contains generic authenticators + helper types
- `scaelcube-services-vault` / contains _service-roles framework_
- updated `scalecube-cluster` -> `2.6.7`
- updated `rsocket` -> `1.0.4`
- fixed `netty` dependency conflict

name: 2.10.13.RC6

* Updated `scalecube-cluster` -> `2.6.7.RC1`

name: prepare-2.10.0-RC7
body:
* Updated parent pom (reverted CI to jdk 8)
* Updated reactor
* Updated reactor netty to 0.9.9
* Added containerHoist/Port for mapping custom address for serviceEndpoint's 
* Added websocket service transport
